name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed a PowerShell script via phishing, resulting in unauthorized data exfiltration.

action--7c7c9fbd-d3f3-4dab-905f-df702d9e.name: Terminate PowerShell sessions
action--7c7c9fbd-d3f3-4dab-905f-df702d9e.description: Terminate all PowerShell sessions to prevent further execution of malicious scripts.

while-condition--b5867601-2b4e-4e31-89da.name: Ensure all PowerShell processes are stopped
while-condition--b5867601-2b4e-4e31-89da.description: Loop until all PowerShell processes are terminated.

action--c489e0f6-7f3a-4f68-bf23-404bde6c.name: Isolate affected host
action--c489e0f6-7f3a-4f68-bf23-404bde6c.description: Isolate the host to prevent data exfiltration.

action--a6c8e2ce-8f85-409f-8e3f-b149e2fd.name: Update firewall rules
action--a6c8e2ce-8f85-409f-8e3f-b149e2fd.description: Deny outbound connections to the external IP involved in data exfiltration.

commands.command: ufw deny out from any to 192.0.2.124

external_ip.description: The IP address to which data was being exfiltrated.

action--b0d1b914-e38f-476e-a29b-18e9d13e.name: Scan for additional threats
action--b0d1b914-e38f-476e-a29b-18e9d13e.description: Scan the system to find and eliminate any other potential threats.

action--5f058a88-a230-4dda-add8-14c5c020.name: Restore affected systems from backup
action--5f058a88-a230-4dda-add8-14c5c020.description: Restore the affected systems from a safe backup after ensuring no malware is present.
